com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.actuators

Class MotorGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.actuators.Motor
      • com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.actuators.MotorGroup

  • public class MotorGroup
extends Motor
    A class that lets you group together motors and mass-set their speeds. Specific motors can also be inverted.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.explodingbacon.bcnlib.actuators.Motor
